title: 自动造轨，清除障碍+自动装饰
author: Glyceryl
txt_content:
本人自己根据网上的各种自动造轨的方法，弄了个这样的命令，这条命令的特点是自动铺轨并安放红石块，清除前面及周围障碍，并自动装饰周围。
缺点是：有时可能会失败，需要特殊位置摆放，而且只能朝着一个方向造轨，如果造轨太长，造轨机会坏掉。


命令如下：
/summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~ ~2 {Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~2 minecraft:redstone_block 0 replace",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~2 minecraft:activator_rail 0 replace",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~ ~-2 ~ ~ ~-30 ~-1 minecraft:log 0 replace",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~ ~1 ~ ~ ~10 ~ minecraft:air 0 replace",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~1 ~1 ~ ~1 ~-1 ~ minecraft:glowstone 0 replace",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~-1 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~-1 ~ minecraft:glowstone 0 replace",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:golden_rail",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~1 ~-2 ~ ~1 ~-30 ~ minecraft:quartz_block 0 replace",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~-1 ~-2 ~ ~-1 ~-30 ~ minecraft:quartz_block 0 replace"}}}}}}}}}
